name: Pandum online (itch)
description:
Pandum online  is a MMORPG where players evolve in a dark fantasy universe plunged into chaos by divinities. Skills and statistics can be freely assigned, allowing to build custom character classes. This game owns all classical elements of an RPG, such mounts, pets, equipment which can be enhanced and craft. Players can team up to achieve quests or fight themselves every where in the open world (except in trade zone where characters can open shop that will remains after disconnection). Some alternative game play are also present such a battle arena and a card game in a tavern.

Here are some original things related to this game

  • Arcadified game play : no windows for skills, inventory ..., everything is done from a single browsable action bar.
  • Dungeons are small with some platform oriented sequences.
  • Almost real time ranking on web site with different categories (wealth, level, speed run ...) giving some HP bonuses
  • In game mini voice messages between team members

Controls

NOTE : keys can be remapped from configuration menu on login screen

NOTE : You can modify inventory mode in advanced menu (top right corner), to use directly items instead having a confirmation dialog

(laptop)

  • Left click on ground or use direction arrows to move
  • Click on a target or press Tab key to auto select an enemy
  • Right click/Enter key to attack or dash if you are far from an enemy, this will consume stamina (orange bar on left of screen). Base attack damages depends on the stamina level.
  • Use the key Q/W to navigate in inventory or skill bar
  • Press Space bar to use an item or a skill. When casting a skill, if you press the space key before the end of the progress indicator, th power of the skill will be diminished
  • Right click/Enter key to activate an interactive environment element which have turned blue where player is nearby. Note that for crafting, you need to select first an appropriate item in inventory (potion or equipment according to your activity)

 (android)

  • Tap on ground or use direction circle in bottom right of screen to move
  • Tap on an enemy or use the target icon in bottom right of screen to select an enemy
  • Tap the sword icon in bottom right of screen to attack or dash if you are far from an enemy, this will consume
    stamina (orange bar on left of screen). Base attack damages depends on the stamina level.
  • Swipe finger vertically on the bottom part of the screen to switch between inventory and skill bars
  • Swip finger horizontally on bottom part of the screen to navigate in the inventory or skill bar
  • Tap the selected item in bar to use it or to launch a skill. When casting a skill, if you tap again before the end of the progress indicator, th power of the skill will be diminished
  • Tap the sword icon in bottom right of screen to activate an interactive environment element which have turned blue where
    player is nearby. Note that for crafting, you need to select first an appropriate item in inventory (potion or equipment according to your activity)
